dict.acceptation: 推荐；推荐信；建议；可取之处；

sent.orig: You need to ask two evaluators to fill in the Recommendation and Recommendation Evaluation Forms.
sent.trans: 推荐信和推荐人评估表要由两个推荐人来填写和准备。

sent.orig: Two letter of recommendation: at least one recommendation must be from a Chinese instructor.
sent.trans: 推荐书二份：应包括一份中国语文教师推荐书。

sent.orig: This Recommendation uses description defined in Recommendation G. 805, the generic functional architecture of transport networks.
sent.trans: 本建议采用建议G.805（传送网的通用功能性结构）所规定的结构表述形式。

sent.orig: He is released on the recommendation of the parole board or on the parole board's recommendation.
sent.trans: 因假释委员会的建议他被释放。

sent.orig: ILO Convention 138 & Recommendation 146 (Minimum Age and Recommendation)
sent.trans: 国际劳工组织公约第135号（工人代表公约）
